title: S2 Ep14: A green monetary policy
itunes:title: A green monetary policy
description: We're not short of policies intended to save us from catastrophic climate change, but should monetary policy be part of this effort? Dirk Schoenmaker of Erasmus University thinks so, and he tells Tim Phillips how it would work in practice.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
